name: Saving X-Mas
description:
Summary

Evil snowmen are trying to ruin Christmas! They have stolen all the gifts and locked up Santa. You may be nothing more than an ordinary deer but you must navigate through The Workshop to save Santa and recover as many gifts on the way as possible so that Christmas can be restored.

Be careful when looking for him though, you never know what surprises are hidden under the snow!

Mechanics

Click on any tile next to an open one to reveal what is underneath the snow

Try to find the stairs leading to the next floor

Stuffed bears will attack you when you attack them and may drop a reward once defeated

Snowmen will attack every two actions you take

There is 1 gift per floor - try to collect as many as possible

Candy canes will restore your hp and you die when they reach 0.

GOOD LUCK, SANTA IS COUNTING ON YOU!
